header.top_notice: EcoDeli offers eco-friendly and community-based delivery. Find deliveries near you!

hero_section.title: Eco-friendly delivery, within everyone's reach.
hero_section.subtitle: EcoDeli is a ride-sharing platform that connects individuals with eco-friendly and community-based deliveries. By sharing their trips, users can send or transport packages at a lower cost while reducing their carbon footprint and fostering social connections.

collaborative_delivery.title: Collaborative package delivery
collaborative_delivery.description: We help reduce carbon emissions by promoting collaborative transport of goods. EcoDeli facilitates connections between senders and carriers for a greener service.

personal_services.title: Personal services
personal_services.description: Find reliable people for local tasks: occasional deliveries, errands, daily commutes. The future of transport relies on local mutual aidâ€”more economical, humane, and ethical.

product_repatriation.title: Purchases and product repatriation
product_repatriation.description: Buy or pick up items and groceries locally, hassle-free, while traveling smarter.

chariot_rental.title: Cart sharing
chariot_rental.description: EcoDeli encourages useful and flexible cart exchanges between individuals, made available in key areas.

what_is_ecodeli.question: What is EcoDeli and how does it work?
what_is_ecodeli.answer: EcoDeli is a crowdshipping platform that connects senders with travelers or drivers willing to transport their packages during planned trips, reducing environmental impact. Users post a listing, track the package in real-time, and benefit from secure delivery thanks to the insurance offered by EcoDeli.

become_delivery_person.question: How can I become a delivery person on EcoDeli?
become_delivery_person.answer: To become a delivery person, simply create an account on EcoDeli, then browse available listings near you. Once you select a listing, you can propose your trip and agree on terms with the sender. It's simple, quick, and commitment-free.

delivery_security.question: Are deliveries secure and insured?
delivery_security.answer: Yes, EcoDeli implements several measures to ensure delivery security. Profiles are verified, exchanges are secured via the platform, and we encourage users to leave reviews to build trust. Insurance may also be offered for certain packages based on their value.

legal_mentions.title: Legal notices
legal_mentions.intro: In accordance with applicable legal provisions, you will find below information about the site's publisher, privacy policy, terms and conditions, as well as an important note about the fictional nature of the project.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy policy and cookies
privacy_policy.content:
EcoDeli places great importance on protecting your privacy.

No personal data is collected without your consent. The site uses Matomo, a privacy-respecting audience measurement tool, configured without cookies and without collecting identifiable personal data.

Technologies used on this site:
  • Svelte: frontend framework
  • TailwindCSS and DaisyUI: interface libraries
  • FontShare: royalty-free fonts

No data is shared with third parties, and no advertising is displayed.

You can request the deletion of any data concerning you by contacting the project team.

terms_of_use.title: Terms of Use (ToU)
terms_of_use.content:
Access to and use of the EcoDeli site are strictly reserved for personal use, within the scope of consulting the project. Any commercial or professional use is prohibited.

The user agrees to use the site in compliance with current French legislation.

As the site is fictional, some features may be non-functional or simulated for educational purposes.

The authors disclaim any responsibility for the use of the information presented on this site.

terms_of_sale.title: General Terms of Sale (GTS)
terms_of_sale.content:
No actual sales are conducted on this platform.

The General Terms of Sale are present solely for illustrative purposes as part of the simulation project.

No payment, product, or service will actually be delivered via EcoDeli.

Any reference to a transaction, price, or order is fictional and has no contractual effect.

The user is informed that the site does not offer any commercial services.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer - Fictional project
disclaimer.content:
EcoDeli is a fictional educational project developed by ESGI students as part of their academic year.

This is not a real company, and no delivery or intermediation services are actually offered.

All displayed data (listings, profiles, trips, etc.) are simulated.

The goal of this project is to demonstrate technical skills in web development, UX/UI, project management, and deployment of modern applications.

Any resemblance to existing services is purely coincidental.
